title: How to Draw a Simple Ice Cream Cone

steps.headline: Sketch a V shape below the oblong.
Draw criss-crossed lines on the cone's body using slanted lines.
Draw a v shape with a curved bend.
Draw a line on the top that is slightly longer than the top of the v.
Draw a line above it that is slightly longer than the one underneath.
Connect the two lines at the ends.
Draw a the scoop of ice cream on top.
Add an optional cuboid to be a 99 flake!

text: A Basic Ice Cream Cone Draw an oblong.  Sketch a V shape below the oblong.  Draw criss-crossed lines on the cone's body using slanted lines.  Color your drawing.  A Cartoon Ice Cream Cone Draw a v shape with a curved bend.  Draw a line on the top that is slightly longer than the top of the v.  Draw a line above it that is slightly longer than the one underneath. Make the lines parallel. Connect the two lines at the ends. That is the cone done. Draw a the scoop of ice cream on top.  Add an optional cuboid to be a 99 flake!  Then color in!
